content: I was wondering about creating a chatting platform for Logic (preferably in Zulip). By the way, I don't know if there already exists a chatting platform for such discussions. In which case please let me know about it.

Logic as a whole is an enormous field - I don't know if the nice experience of this place can be scaled to that size... Just imagine the length of the side scrollbar. But of course, if you encounter that kind of problems, it means you have succeeded in creating a vibrant place :smile:
Ok. Maybe I will give it a go and see how it goes.

Sayantan Roy said:

Ok. Maybe I will give it a go and see how it goes.

So, here is the link for the same. Please let me know if you face any difficulties in joining.
When I go to https://mathematical-logic.zulipchat.com and try to sign in I get "You need an invitation to join this organization.".
So I guess you need to distribute invite links, @Sayantan Roy ?
I would like to mention that in creating the new streams (and their descriptions) I am very closely following this platform. I hope no one has any objection(s) :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes: !
Imitation is the highest form of flattery!
